price: 38. Todo lo malo que ha sido mencionado (y prohibido anteriormente) es detestable para tu Señor.
arabic: كُلُّ ذَٰلِكَ كَانَ سَيِّئُهُۥ عِندَ رَبِّكَ مَكۡرُوهٗا

version.title: Spanish Translation (Latin America) - Noor International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into Spanish (Latin America) by Noor International (Ed. 2017)

meta.transliteration: kullu dhālika kāna sayyi-uhu ʿinda rabbika makrūhan
